Title: Service4u2 - C# JSON MVC Service helper library
Description:
A lightweight helper library written in C# for creating services that consume REST like JSON services.  Built to quickly allow using a .Net MVC site as a JSON API.

Contains versions for WPF / Winforms, Silverlight 3 and 4, and Windows Phone 7.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A lightweight helper library written in C# for creating services that consume REST like JSON services. Built to quickly allow using a .Net MVC site as a JSON API.

Contains versions for WPF / Winforms, Silverlight 3 and 4, and Windows Phone 7.

Created by Jacob Gable
